title: Checkers sans-serif
author: JinWook

comments.content: [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063716/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) Black with reduced /h and /k ascenders and tightly trackened

My word, you're correct. They butchered that "C" completely, which is why I didn't recognise it. It's literally been squashed to 85% of it's height, along with the "h" and "k" having their ascenders cropped off.
